required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: B010-A Injection for Treating Patients With GPC3 Positive Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Open-label, Single Arm Study Targeting Glypican-3 (GPC3) Chimeric Antigen Receptor Modified T Cells (CAR-T) for Treatment of Advanced Hepatocellular Carcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: This is an Open-label, Single Arm study to observe the safety and tolerability of B010-A in the treatment of advanced hepatocellular carcinoma.

detailed_description.textblock: All subjects participating in this study will receive peripheral blood mononuclear cell collection to produce B010-A injection products after enrollment. Subjects may receive bridging anti-cancer therapy while waiting for the production of B010-A injection. All subjects need to undergo baseline assessment before receiving cell infusion. For all subjects, the baseline assessment includes weight, body surface area, vital signs, physical examination, ECOG score, laboratory examination, coagulation function, etiological examination, 12-lead ECG, echocardiogram, cytokine testing, Tumor marker detection and ICE score, etc. Each subject will receive lymphodepletion prior to B010-A infusion, and dose-limiting toxicity (DLT) assessment will be performed on D28 after the first infusion.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events [Safety and Tolerability] after B010-A injection.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the cellular kinetics of subjects after B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Copy number of transgenes of GPC3-CAR-T (qPCR).

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the cellular kinetics of subjects after B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Copy number of CAR-T cell transgene level detection (flow cytometry).

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the pharmacodynamics of subjects after B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the pharmacodynamics of subjects after B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluate the preliminary efficacy of B010-A after injection.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of free GPC3 protein in peripheral blood, and lymphocyte subpopulation.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the progression-free survival of all subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the overall survival of all subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the objective remission rate of all subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the disease control rate of all subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the duration of remission of all subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 24 months post B010-A injection.
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the disease control time of all subjects

arm_group.arm_group_label: Experimental: B010-A injection for patient with GPC3 Positive Hepatocellular Carcinoma

intervention.description: 1.0×105/kg positive CAR-T cells injection. 2-n doses will be evaluated by the investigator if participant is qualify for certain condition.
intervention.arm_group_label: Experimental: B010-A injection for patient with GPC3 Positive Hepatocellular Carcinoma

intervention.description: 2.0×105/kg positive CAR-T cells injection. 2-n doses will be evaluated by the investigator if participant is qualify for certain condition.
intervention.arm_group_label: Experimental: B010-A injection for patient with GPC3 Positive Hepatocellular Carcinoma

intervention.description: 3.0×105/kg positive CAR-T cells injection. 2-n doses will be evaluated by the investigator if participant is qualify for certain condition.
intervention.arm_group_label: Experimental: B010-A injection for patient with GPC3 Positive Hepatocellular Carcinoma
